hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"When any one of you wakes from sleep to perform Wudu', then let him sniff water in his nose and blow it out three times, for the Shaitan spends the night on his nose

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِالاِسْتِنْثَارِ عِنْدَ الاِسْتِيقَاظِ مِنَ النَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: The Command To Sniff Water Up Into The Nose When Waking From Sleep
